channel.title: The easiest problem ever.. but i cant answer it!
channel.description:
Hey Im trying to make a webclient yes a webclient and it involes me deleting a whole method and replacing it i do so i delete the method then paste the new one in. its all in one line and to correct it you have to press enter a zillion times. pic of what I mean:
When New Text Is pasted with word wrap on : [url=http://img638.imageshack.us/img638/6927/theproblem.png]http://img638.imageshack.us/img638/6927/theproblem.png[/url] check these bits "{" and "}" then you can see their in the totally wrong place.
Has anyone got a work around for this?

item.title: The easiest problem ever.. but i cant answer it!

item.description:
@Andy89898 wrote:

Hey Im trying to make a webclient yes a webclient and it involes me deleting a whole method and replacing it i do so i delete the method then paste the new one in. its all in one line and to correct it you have to press enter a zillion times. pic of what I mean:

When New Text Is pasted with word wrap on : http://img638.imageshack.us/img638/6927/theproblem.png
check these bits “{” and “}” then you can see their in the totally wrong place.

Has anyone got a work around for this?
